author: Staff Reporter
text: Power supply will be suspended from 9 a.m. to 5 p.m. on January 23 in the following areas due to essential maintenance work at the Thorapadi electricity sub-station – Bagayam, Sitheri, Idayansathu, Virupatchipuram, Palavansathu, Sami Nagar, Sainathapuram, Ezhil Nagar, Shastri Nagar, Gandhi Nagar, Ariyur and surrounding villages, according to a press release from Tamil Nadu Generation and Distribution Corporation.
title: Power shutdown tomorrow
